### Tender Announcement: CF-18 Avionics In-Service Support

**Tender Number:** PW-__BG-006-28879
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-22AVS2/B

#### Description

The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services Canada, invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the CF-18 Avionics In-Service Support contract. This contract will provide long-term support services for designated CF-18 Avionics Systems, Automatic Test Equipment, and specialized support equipment, including material management and logistic services for the Department of National Defence.

#### Scope of Work

The contract will entail the following activities:

* Program Management Services
* Engineering Services
* Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul (MRO) Services
* Materiel Management and Logistic Services
* Technical Information Support

#### Delivery and Evaluation

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Suppliers may submit a bid in either official language of Canada. The tender will be evaluated based on the best overall proposal, considering both technical merit and price.

#### Supporting Documents

The tender package, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, is available for download from the Government of Canada's procurement website, [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-17T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-01-13

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Matthew MacLean, Technical Buyer
Analytics and Correspondence, Public Works and Government Services Canada
Phone: (343) 576-2979
Email: [matthew.maclean@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.maclean@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that the tender files provided are subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document.
